EmailTemplate.name: Account QA Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: {!MPM4_BASE__Milestone1_Project__c.Name} QA Issue
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi MPM4_BASE__Milestone1_Project__c,
{!MPM4_BASE__Milestone1_Project__c.LastModifiedBy} has completed the quality assurance checks for the Project {!MPM4_BASE__Milestone1_Project__c.Name}.
You can now send the account credentials to the customer.
If there are any issues with this email please contact your Salesforce Administrator.
